metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3622 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The _asn1_extract_der_octet function in lib/decoding.c in GNU Libtasn1before 4.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds heap read) via a crafted certificate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3622` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtasn1-3-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.3
libtasn1-6 - 3.4-3ubuntu0.3
libtasn1-bin - 3.4-3ubuntu0.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4-3ubuntu0.3').
